MENDIS – TONY – Beloved husband of Premela,​ loving father of Dr Deepa,​ Ramani,​ Anusha and Chandika and father-in-law of Dr Jude,​ Noel,​ Bernard and Thabeetha,​ grandfather of Udara,​ Gihan,​ Dilan,​ Nikesha,​ Dilushi,​ Avani,​ Haresh,​ Chiara and Tiana. Remains will lie at residence No. 56,​ Negombo Road,​ Tudella,​ Ja-Ela from 11.30 a.m. onwards on Wednesday,​ 1st of May 2024. Thereafter remains will be at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on Thursday,​ 2nd May 2024 from 10.30 a.m. onwards. Funeral Service at 2.30 p.m. on same day followed by Burial at General Cemetery Borella at 3 p.m. (R.C. Section).
